devskim.rules.Description: Settings for controlling which DevSkim rules are enabled and custom rule paths.
devskim.suppressions.Description: Settings for controlling how DevSkim suppressions are created and managed.
devskim.triggers.Description: Settings for controlling when DevSkim scans are triggered.
devskim.ignores.Description: Settings for ignoring specific rules or files.
devskim.rules.enableManualReviewSeverity: Enable rules that require manual review.
devskim.rules.enableBestPracticeSeverity: Enable rules for best practice recommendations.
Enable rules with high confidence findings.
devskim.rules.enableMediumConfidenceRule: Enable rules with medium confidence findings.
devskim.rules.enableLowConfidenceRules.D: Enable rules with low confidence findings.
devskim.rules.ignoreDefaultRules.Descrip: When enabled, the built-in default rules are not loaded. Only custom rules will be used.
devskim.rules.customRulesPaths.Descripti: Semicolon-separated list of paths to directories containing custom DevSkim rules.
devskim.rules.customLanguagesPath.Descri: Path to a custom language definitions file.
devskim.rules.customCommentsPath.Descrip: Path to a custom comment definitions file.
devskim.rules.guidanceBaseURL.Descriptio: Base URL for rule guidance documentation.
devskim.suppressions.suppressionCommentS: Comment style used for suppression comments. Valid values: Line, Block.
Name used to populate the reviewer field in suppression comments.
devskim.suppressions.suppressionDuration: Default number of days before a suppression expires.
devskim.triggers.scanOnOpen.Description: Run DevSkim analysis when a file is opened.
devskim.triggers.scanOnSave.Description: Run DevSkim analysis when a file is saved.
devskim.triggers.scanOnChange.Descriptio: Run DevSkim analysis when a file is modified.
devskim.triggers.removeFindingsOnClose.D: Remove DevSkim findings when a file is closed.
devskim.ignores.ignoreRulesList.Descript: Comma-separated list of DevSkim rule IDs to ignore.
devskim.ignores.ignoreFiles.Description: Comma-separated list of file glob patterns to exclude from scanning.
devskim.diagnostics.Description: Settings for DevSkim extension diagnostics and logging.
devskim.diagnostics.enableFileLogging.De: Write extension logs to a file in the temp directory (devskim-vs-extension.log). Useful for troubleshooting.
